org.sakaiproject.content.api

Interface SiteSpecificResourceType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ResourceType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicSiteSelectableResourceType, FormResourceType

    public interface SiteSpecificResourceType
extends ResourceType
    SiteSpecificResourceType is a ResourceType that can be enabled or disabled on a site-by-site basis.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.sakaiproject.content.api.ResourceType

        EXPANDABLE_FOLDER_SIZE_LIMIT, MAX_LENGTH_LONG_SIZE_LABEL, MAX_LENGTH_SHORT_SIZE_LABEL, MIME_TYPE_HTML, MIME_TYPE_METAOBJ, MIME_TYPE_TEXT, MIME_TYPE_URL, TYPE_FOLDER, TYPE_HTML, TYPE_METAOBJ, TYPE_TEXT, TYPE_UPLOAD, TYPE_URL

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isEnabledByDefault()
      Determine whether the type is enabled by default.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.sakaiproject.content.api.ResourceType

        getAction, getActions, getActions, getIconLocation, getId, getLabel, getLocalizedHoverText, getLongSizeLabel, getSizeLabel, hasAvailabilityDialog, hasDescription, hasGroupsDialog, hasNotificationDialog, hasOptionalPropertiesDialog, hasPublicDialog, hasRightsDialog, isExpandable

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabledByDefault

        boolean isEnabledByDefault()
        Determine whether the type is enabled by default.
        Returns:
        true if the type is enabled by default and false otherwise.
